name: Thief House Simulator
description:
Becoming a" good thief " is a lot of work. You must initially choose a potential victim-the house. Learn the schedule of owners and neighbors, their habits. Think of ways of approach, penetration and retreat. Provide a backup option. And then, once on the object, you should act quickly, decisively, carefully, leaving as little as possible traces of an outsider. Take only the most valuable, small size, not heavy.

GAMEPLAY
Tell a little about the gameplay, which offers you to become a real thief. Do what makes the real thieves!
There is a goal-it is a robbery. Besides, it is necessary to plunder much and everywhere. But to decide what to steal, to Rob the house, it is necessary only to you. Keep an eye on the owners of houses and what is best to take them in the house.
COLLECT INFORMATION
A good thief always tracking down what's going on. What's inside? Is he home? Find out when no one's home. Choose one house. (we'll add more soon)

DO NOT HESITATE
Faster, better. Find and steal the maximum value, coping in the shortest possible time. Remember that bottomless backpacks do not happen. When the time comes, you must be led by a cold calculation. In every house there is a mass of useless stuff that will only slow you down. If you are not sure that you can get good money for a thing, perhaps the best solution is to leave it and save space for really expensive goods. If you fill your backpack with unnecessary garbage, there is a great chance that you will have to spend precious time to free up space for more valuable things. Be careful!

LANTERN
A real experienced thief knows where you can easily find valuable things. Use the flashlight at night to illuminate the values in front of you and the places where they can be.
